SEARCH
Package com.weatherSDK

Class WeatherSDKClientHandler

java.lang.Object
com.weatherSDK.WeatherSDKClientHandler
public class WeatherSDKClientHandler extends Object
This is a basic class to initialize the WeatherSDK.
It checks a Map of records of API_KEYS that you provide to manage with several instances.
Use instances to set up multiple profiles to handle with.

You have to use static getInstance() method to start work with the WeatherSDK.

    • WeatherSDKClientHandler

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static WeatherClient getInstance(String apiKey, BehaviourMode behaviourMode)
      getInstance() method controls the Map of 'instances' preventing you to create profile with API_KEY that has duplicated.
      Parameters:
      apiKey - you have to provide the valid API_KEY from OpenWeatherMap.
      behaviourMode - behaviourMode is useful to point on work mode you want to work with.
      Returns:
      getInstance() returns the instance of WeatherClient which works with specified API_KEY.
      Throws:
      WeatherClientApiKeyDuplicatedException - throws this exception in case the API_KEY is already presented in the instance pool.
      See Also:
      • OpenWeatherMap

    • removeInstance

      public static void removeInstance(String apiKey)
      Use this method to delete instance with the specified API_KEY.
      Parameters:
      apiKey - use the API_KEY you used to create the instance to delete it.
      Throws:
      WeatherClientApiKeyHasNotBeenFoundException - throws this exception in case the API_KEY does not exist in the instance pool.
